text:
The following gives me:

Exception in ServerPagesGenerator.generate()

>>>>
Create a new page.
Delete the page.
Select the deleted page in the trash - error
<<<<

daniel
creator: roku@apache.org
roku@apache.org
text:
The offending line is

      SiteTreeNode node = (SiteTreeNode) <input:get-attribute module="sitetree"
as="object" name="authoring-node"/>; 

in lenya/content/info/overview.xsp.

The object returned is a String in this case.

Nobby, any ideas how to fix this?

creator: gregor@apache.org
text:
could be due to the visibility patch.

we need to move away from XSP, it does not let us see in eclipse when a patch
breaks APIs

creator: roku@apache.org
text:
What I wanted to say is, that a class cast exception occurs since a String can
not be casted into a SiteTreeNode.

creator: roku@apache.org
text: Gregor, yes, it is the visibility patch.

creator: roku@apache.org
text: I think I found a good workaround. I will test and commit it.

creator: roku@apache.org
text: Fixed in 1.2.x. Not in trunk, since visibility feature is not implemeted in trunk.
Thanks rolf for fixing this. What is your workaround?
creator: jann.forrer@id.unizh.ch
roku@apache.org
text:
Jann, I guess I did more than a workaround now. I think it is more a real patch.
Look at the files

src/java/org/apache/lenya/cms/cocoon/components/modules/input/SitetreeModule.java
src/webapp/lenya/content/info/overview.xsp
